message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a product that I believe you'll find incredibly valuable. Given its potential, I'm proposing a starting price of $1,400,000. I'm confident this will be a worthwhile investment for you.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,300,000. I believe this price is more in line with my budget and would allow me to get a better return on investment.
Bob, I understand your perspective on the price.  To find a middle ground, I'm willing to come down to $1,375,000. This offer reflects the true value of the product and allows both of us to benefit.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above $1,325,000. I'm willing to meet you in the middle, so my revised offer is $1,350,000. I believe this is a fair price that reflects the product's value and my budget.
